articles.description:
Some people framing ETH POW as an airdrop. It's not.
Our advise to you: don't touch ETH POW or you'll get rekt.
Robert Leshner:â€‚The Ethereum merge (switch to proof of stake from proof of work) is a few weeks out. For most folks in the Ethereum community, this is maybe the most meaningful event of the past five years.
Some advice for beginners (and experts):
articles.title: Some people framing ETH POW as an airdrop. It's not. Our advise to you: don't touch ETH POW or you'll get rekt.
